title: What did I do to deserve a penalty?
body: So I guess I have to have pissed someone off because I ended up getting reported and punished for seemingly no reason. I'm honestly trying to figure out what I did or said that would get me in trouble and the only thing I could possibly think of is the fact that I played Yasuo and did poorly. Even then, I can't think of anything that I said that was even remotely toxic, I didn't trash talk and I wasn't even tilted that game. I was just dashing around and trying to figure out how to play Yasuo properly. Any advice on this matter is appreciated.

replies.body:
You get a popup in the client as well as an email, both explaining why you got restricted/banned and providing chatlogs, if relevant.

If you got neither of those, send a polite support ticket to riot asking for an explanation and further investigation if you feel it is an error.

Well... what did they tell you you were punished for? There should have been some kind of pop up explaining why you were punished. If not, and even if so, you can file a support ticket for more explanation.
you were banned for playing yasuo {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
